verses.verse: (For the choir director; upon Aijeleth Hashshahar. A Psalm of David.) My <S%H410>God,<s%> my <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> hast Thou <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me? <S%H7350>Far<s%> from my <S%H3444>deliverance<s%> are the <S%H1697>words<s%> of my <S%H7581>groaning.<s%>
O my <S%H430>God,<s%> I <S%H7121>cry<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> but Thou dost not <S%H6030>answer;<s%> And by <S%H3915>night,<s%> but I have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1747>rest.<s%>
Yet Thou art <S%H6918>holy,<s%> O Thou who art <S%H3427>enthroned<s%> upon the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
In Thee our fathers <S%H1>trusted;<s%> They <S%H982>trusted,<s%> and Thou didst <S%H982>deliver<s%> them.
To Thee they <S%H2199>cried<s%> out, and were <S%H4422>delivered;<s%> In Thee they <S%H982>trusted,<s%> and were not <S%H954>disappointed.<s%>
But I am a <S%H9641>worm,<s%> and not a <S%H376>man,<s%> A <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> and <S%H959>despised<s%> by the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> who <S%H7200>see<s%> me <S%H3932>sneer<s%> at me; They <S%H6362>separate<s%> with the <S%H8193>lip,<s%> they <S%H5128>wag<s%> the <S%H7218>head,<s%> [saying,]
<S%H1556>"Commit<s%> [yourself] to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> let Him <S%H6403>deliver<s%> him; Let Him <S%H5337>rescue<s%> him, <S%H3588>because<s%> He <S%H2654>delights<s%> in him."
<S%H3588>Yet<s%> Thou art He who didst <S%H1518>bring<s%> me <S%H1518>forth<s%> from the <S%H990>womb;<s%> Thou didst make me <S%H982>trust<s%> [when] upon my mother's <S%H7699>breasts.<s%>
Upon Thee I was <S%H7993>cast<s%> from <S%H7358>birth;<s%> Thou hast been my <S%H410>God<s%> from my mother's <S%H990>womb.<s%>
Be not <S%H7368>far<s%> from me, for <S%H6869>trouble<s%> is <S%H7138>near;<s%> For <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5826>help.<s%>
<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> have <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> me; <S%H47>Strong<s%> [bulls] of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> have <S%H3803>encircled<s%> me.
They <S%H6475>open<s%> <S%H6475>wide<s%> their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> at me, As a <S%H2963>ravening<s%> and a <S%H7580>roaring<s%> <S%H9030>lion.<s%>

I am <S%H8210>poured<s%> out like <S%H4325>water,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> are out of <S%H6504>joint;<s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is like <S%H1749>wax;<s%> It is <S%H4549>melted<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> me.

My <S%H3581>strength<s%> is <S%H3001>dried<s%> up like a <S%H2789>potsherd,<s%> And my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>cleaves<s%> to my <S%H9270>jaws;<s%> And Thou dost <S%H8239>lay<s%> me in the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>

For <S%H3611>dogs<s%> have <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> me; A <S%H5712>band<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers<s%> has <S%H5362>encompassed<s%> me; They <S%H9206>pierced<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> and my <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
I can <S%H5608>count<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6106>bones.<s%> They <S%H5027>look,<s%> they <S%H7200>stare<s%> at me;
They <S%H2505>divide<s%> my <S%H899>garments<s%> among them, And for my <S%H3830>clothing<s%> they <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots.<s%>
But Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> be not <S%H7368>far<s%> off; O Thou my <S%H360>help,<s%> <S%H2363>hasten<s%> to my <S%H5833>assistance.<s%>
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> My <S%H3173>only<s%> [life] from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H3611>dog.<s%>
<S%H3467>Save<s%> me from the lion's <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> And from the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H7214>wild<s%> <S%H7214>oxen<s%> Thou dost <S%H6030>answer<s%> me.
I will <S%H5608>tell<s%> of Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> to my <S%H251>brethren;<s%> In the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> Thee.

You who <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> Him; <S%H3605>All<s%> you <S%H2233>descendants<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3513>glorify<s%> Him, And <S%H9076>stand<s%> in <S%H9076>awe<s%> of Him, <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H2233>descendants<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For He has not <S%H959>despised<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8262>abhorred<s%> the <S%H6039>affliction<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted;<s%> <S%H3808>Neither<s%> has He <S%H5641>hidden<s%> His <S%H6440>face<s%> from him; But when he <S%H7768>cried<s%> to Him for <S%H7768>help,<s%> He <S%H8085>heard.<s%>
From Thee [comes] my <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>assembly;<s%> I shall <S%H9608>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> Him.

The <S%H6035>afflicted<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied;<s%> Those who <S%H1875>seek<s%> Him will <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> Let your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H5703>forever!<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> will <S%H2142>remember<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee.
For the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> is the Lord's, And He <S%H4910>rules<s%> over the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H1879>prosperous<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> will <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H7812>worship,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> those who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6083>dust<s%> will <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Him, Even he who <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H2421>keep<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2421>alive.<s%>
<S%H2233>Posterity<s%> will <S%H5647>serve<s%> Him; It will be <S%H5608>told<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> to the [coming] <S%H1755>generation.<s%>
They will <S%H935>come<s%> and will <S%H5046>declare<s%> His <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> To a <S%H5971>people<s%> who will be <S%H3205>born,<s%> that He has <S%H6213>performed<s%> [it.]
